effect.name: Brighten by background
effect.author: Looki
effect.description: Brightens the input image by adding a portion of the average background color, with an option to invert the background before blending. The effect uses a 3x3 sampling of the background texture to calculate the average color for the brightening effect.

parameter.name: Invert amount
parameter.description: If checked, the background color is inverted (high <> low).
